thread.title: For the Lavish, Romantic & Fabulous
thread.title_full: For the Lavish, Romantic & Fabulous - Review of Hotel Banke, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ixorias
title: For the Lavish, Romantic & Fabulous
text:
Hotel Banke is second to none if you are looking for a hotel that boasts historic architecture & features, yet offers a sexy, indulgent decor fit for a romantic night or flamboyant weekend.
The interior is impressive and you cannot stop yourself from being wowed by the fabulous lobby as you enter. Our room and en-suite were great. Lolabar is a must-visit for gin lovers and anyone who appreciates the beautiful creations of a talented cocktail mixologist.
Perhaps visiting on a Sunday night impacted the atmosphere, but Hotel Banke lacked any during our visit, which was disappointing as it was so apparent. My only other negative would be that our room keys did not work on our final day as there had been an issue with our late check-out (which had been confirmed). It was not a problem for the front desk to reactive the keys, but it would have saved us the journey and inconvenience if we had not been locked out in the first place.
Overall, I would definitely recommend Banke Hotel. The location was great for us, as it is not far from the Eurostar terminal and is a convenient location to explore the Opera district. I only wish I could have experienced a longer stay!
